campaign.story:
The Torshn Puzzle is a surprisingly difficult challenge and an alluring addition to your desk, shelf, or coffee table.
The objective is simple– align the colors to each other by sliding the marbles and twisting the halves. Solving the puzzle may initially seem straightforward, but you’ll quickly find that it’s trickier than it looks! 
The dichotomy between simplicity and complexity is what makes the Torshn Puzzle a special puzzle for people of all ages and backgrounds. While an 11-year-old may not have a fully developed brain, she does not have the hindering ego of a 30-year-old college grad. While the working adult may have the spatial awareness and problem solving skills to manipulate the puzzle more efficiently, they may not have the patience and perseverance of a retired grandma with time to kill. Everyone that has picked up the Torshn Puzzle thus far has had a completely different approach to solving it and unique challenges specific to their personality and skillset. 
Like the Rubik’s cube and the original orb puzzle, the Torshn Puzzle is complex enough to be fun after multiple solves. However, it is simple enough that it is approachable. You don't need to discover or memorize a bunch of fancy algorithms to solve the Torshn Puzzle, but it sure does help if you do.
In a world that increasingly fills your mind with clutter, it’s important to take a step back and focus your energy into a single objective. The Torshn puzzle is a simple challenge yet requires your undivided attention. We’ve found that playing with the Torshn Puzzle allows us to reduce stress and increase our productivity in other aspects of life. It stimulates, yet eases our minds simultaneously.
The origins of puzzles go back as far as 2300 BC when Ancient Greeks and Egyptians developed and solved labyrinths. Since then, puzzles have grown and evolved into countless shapes and forms. However, the physical and mental benefits of puzzle solving remain all the same.
Puzzles exercise the left and right sides of the brain simultaneously. They’re a mental workout that improves problem-solving skills and attention span. Doing puzzles reinforces connections between brain cells, improves mental speed, and is an especially effective way to improve short-term memory.  It’s no surprise that Bill Gates is an avid puzzler!
Being a three-dimensional challenge, the Torshn puzzle promotes the development of a wider perception to the process of problem solving. It requires spatial awareness and memory, as not all of the spheres are visible simultaneously. Playing with the puzzle develops finger-eye coordination and requires dexterity to reposition the spheres efficiently. Perhaps most important of all, patience and perseverance are also necessary because it's trickier than it looks!

There are more than seven hundred thousand different possible ways for the colors to be arranged, and only 6 different combinations that leave the puzzle solved.

This journey began as a design exploration of the sphericon but quickly became a consuming pursuit to make the greatest puzzle that we could. We wanted to create a unique, forever lasting, and beautiful puzzle that anybody could enjoy and play with.
We know that design must embody purpose– that every aspect of a design must consciously add to its whole. We wanted to make something breathtaking but also ergonomic and simple.

We combined form and function to achieve these three goals:
A design that could easily fit into a museum
A challenge not too difficult for anyone, but tricky enough to be interesting and replayable
A puzzle built with exceptional quality and in a way that would last forever.
  We drew inspiration from a puzzle we grew up playing with– the Orb Puzzle invented by Christopher C. Wiggs and Christopher J. Taylor in 1981.
After months of design, brainstorming, and prototyping, we landed on utilizing the continuous face of a sphericon as cavities for spheres to move along. This allows for extremely smooth and simple movement of the pieces, something that the Orb Puzzle lacked.
The dimensions of the Torshn Puzzle was a challenge to perfect. Larger cavities and spheres made the puzzle easier to work with, but created less visually harmonious proportions. Smaller cavities and more spheres were prettier and closer resembled the original Orb Puzzle, but resulted in a puzzle that was more difficult to solve and difficult to manipulate smoothly.

We played with and tested over 50 iterations of the puzzle. With each puzzle, we fine tuned every curve, track, and divet by as little as a quarter of a millimeter to a develop a puzzle that is as sturdy as a rock, pretty to look at, and graceful to handle.
Longevity is extremely important to us. We despise how unsustainable plastic is. We wanted to create something that would last forever– something that will be passed on for generations to come and won’t end up in a landfill somewhere. We wanted something that had little chance of breaking and would be repairable if it did. So we knew the final product would be constructed from a sustainable metal body.

When we made our first metal prototype, we were blown away. It became a sculpture that you can play with. Steel was too heavy and titanium was too expensive. We decided on anodized aluminum– sturdy yet lightweight.
It’s not cheap to mill from a solid chunk of metal, but after considering countless different manufacturing methods, it’s the only way to make the best Torshn Puzzle that we can. Metal construction allows us to achieve the strict tolerances required for the puzzle to spin smoothly while being everlasting. It also doesn’t hurt that aluminum is the most abundant metal on the planet and 100% recyclable! +1 for sustainability.
It took us a while to perfect the finish– we wanted something that was smooth to the touch and beautiful to look at under all lights. We tried brushed, coated, polished, but ultimately landed on anodized and finely sandblasted. We think that the result is breathtaking.

We’re a team of tinkerers and makers with over 15 years of combined experience in industrial design and contract manufacturing. We share a passion for puzzles of all kinds, and want to share our personal creations with the world. Torshn Design is the product of us being tired of working on projects that we lacked autonomy over. Our goal is to create puzzles that are unique, mind-tickling, and forever-lasting. We’re a small team located in Oakland, California, and we’re excited to embark on this journey with you! 
Why support our campaign?
You or someone you know loves puzzles
  You like conversation starters and desk art
  You need a stress-relieving escape from everyday life
  You have a child and you know that puzzles are one of the greatest tools for their development
  You want to keep your brain sharp and prevent early onset of diseases like Alzheimer's and dementia
  You’re fascinated by rare mathematical shapes
   You want to support designers who are truly passionate about the product they build
  You hate unsustainable products made by conglomerates and want to put your money where your mouth is by helping small creators bring their ideas to life (ok that was a little bit specific...)
  The design is finished, the manufacturing process is solidified, and we’re so excited to share the Torshn Puzzle with the world. We need your help to make our first production run and bring it to life.
Below is a table that represents what our estimated shipping costs are for the Torshn Puzzle. Your pledge does not include shipping and you will pay for shipping AFTER the campaign ends. We are handling shipping this way to get backers the lowest possible shipping price. We don't want to unnecessarily over-charge for shipping. These are estimated costs based on an average range of shipping quotes we've attained from different carriers and may change depending on our final results. We believe we have a pretty efficient solution for US backers (shipping directly from our studio) but are still working on finding even better solutions for international backers (more fulfillment centers). Please keep in mind that the Torshn Puzzle is heavy and that the shipping costs reflect its weight.
After the campaign ends, we will be sending you a BackerKit.com survey which will securely process your color choice, address, and shipping payment which will hopefully be lower than quoted below.
We plan to optimize distribution efficiency and minimize emissions by working with fulfillment partners in multiple countries, rather than shipping each individual package out from our studio. Regardless, please know that we are trying our best to optimize shipping so that everyone can receive the Torshn Puzzle at an affordable rate. Our goal is to make this process as transparent and accurate as possible, without any false promises or unexpected changes.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Production
Our manufacturing process is set in stone, and we’ve partnered up with an extremely experienced factory to bring each Torshn Puzzle to life. They’ve brought great expertise to the table and have been a pleasure to work with. However, in our years of experience in manufacturing and bringing designs to mass production, we’ve learned that seldom does a project go from start to finish without behind-the-scenes roadblocks. We have the experience to deal with that. We’ve mapped out every scenario we can think of to avoid any surprises. However, if anything unexpected does arise, we promise to be 100% transparent with our backers– communication is of utmost importance to us. We believe that great communication builds great relationships and therefore great trust. We look forward to embarking on this journey together!

Shipping & Logistics
Along with rising shipping costs in the last decade, the pandemic has only made logistics more expensive. Especially with the weight of the Torshn Puzzle, we have been quoted higher shipping costs than we would have seen before. We believe we have a pretty efficient solution for US backers but are still working on finding even better solutions for international backers. We want everyone around the world to be able to enjoy the puzzle. Regardless, please know that we are trying our best to optimize shipping so everyone can receive the Torshn Puzzle at an affordable rate.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
From the very beginning, we set out to make a puzzle that would last virtually forever– an heirloom that can be passed on from generation to generation.

Mechanism:
We designed the Torshn Puzzle to be as simple as possible to avoid any complications over time. The cavities through which the marbles move are milled from a solid chunk of aluminum. The precision and smoothness of the cavities prevent the marbles from getting worn down, and the sturdiness of the cavities themselves mean that they won't get eroded by glass marbles either. The spinning mechanism of the Torshn Puzzle is made possible by rare earth neodymium magnets, which are permanent magnets and only lose a fraction of their performance every 100 years. 


Material:
We chose Anodized aluminum because it is extremely sturdy and will not degrade over time. It is more durable, wear resistant, and more life-proof than any wood or plastic alternative.
Reusability and recyclability
Aluminum is the only metal that can be recycled an infinite number of times, as it does not degrade during the recycling process.

Although our packaging isn't set in stone, we plan to use either cork, hemp, or recycled paper to keep the Torshn Puzzle safe in transit rather than bubblewrap or packing peanuts. Plastic sucks.

We also designed the Torshn Puzzle to be easily repairable if anything ever goes wrong. The marbles, magnets, and rotational axis are all easily replaceable if broken or lost.
Sustainable materials
As we've stated before, aluminum is lightweight, strong, and highly recyclable. It is one of the only materials out there that can be recycled an infinite number of times, as it does not degrade during the recycling process.
Sustainable Distribution
We plan to optimize distribution efficiency and minimize emissions by working with fulfillment partners in multiple countries, rather than shipping each individual package out from our studio.

This is shameful. You are clearly talented con artists, but I don't think you recognize the damage your actions cause and the price you will inevitably pay. I know it's easier to make excuses for yourself than to give up your share of 250k but I hope some of you make the right choice in the end and get to go home with a clear conscience.
At the end of the day, we are nothing without our integrity. This is your opportunity to prove yours to the world.

The hypocrisy in the responses is next level. You can't claim to have truly given Devin a chance to respond when you first emailed him three weeks before launch. Your grasp at "fairness" about the supposed work you put in when you only gave the person who inspired your ripoff three weeks prior to launch is telling. You continue digging yourself into a bigger hole with your verbose responses. What you are doing is legal, but it is absolutely unethical and immoral. Any development that occurred after finding Devin's IP is theft, and that INCLUDES any development of milling processes to create this puzzle out of a solid block of aluminum. This project should ABSOLUTELY do the right thing and either add Devin to the project/come to a licensing agreement to grant him royalties, or pull the project and relist it when significant alterations to the design have been made to more clearly differentiate it from the Astrolabicon. campaign.story:
---
Our Marketing Partners 
This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $300MM through crowdfunding.
In collaboration with BackersOnly, an exclusive crowdfunding agency for high profile creators. We've helped 500+ projects raise over $45MM.

Using the ForeverPen
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’re extremely passionate about minimising our everyday carry and committed to doing everything we can to make the ForeverPen a reality.

Ensuring we complete production on time is one of the key goals to successfully running a Kickstarter, so we’ve ensured we have a number of large suppliers and manufacturers who are ready for any number of pens you pledge for.

We’re confident we can get your ForeverPen to you on (or before) August 2021.

This is because we’ve planned for all the hiccups and having backed many Kickstarters ourselves, we know the difficulties that arise and have made plans to mitigate as many of those as we can.

Thank you for your support!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We're making a pen that will last you a really, really long time, so there will be thousands of pens saved from the landfill (because nobody ever finishes all the ink before they lose the pen).

It also sits on your keys, so it'll never go missing.
Reusability and recyclability
We're using recycled packaging to make sure no extra materials are generated and we can do our part.
Sustainable Distribution
They will be shipped directly to you and use your local couriers for last mile delivery, keeping emissions to a minimum.

updates.update_userinfo: A quick update. Survey coming soon.
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
Thank you for backing our ForeverPen project!
We want to give a huge shoutout to the first 100 of you that have supported us in hitting and surpassing our goal in just short of 60 minutes!
We LOVE the Kickstarter community and we can’t wait to bring you the most amazing pen that'll last a lifetime!

campaign.story:
ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM! What's the Scoop? 
ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM! The Family Game of Dice with a Cherry on Top!
ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM! is a family game for all ages where you each own a competing ice cream shop! You roll 7 dice to dish out ice cream cones complete with whipped cream and a cherry on top! Kids as young as 5 can quickly learn the base game because it is so visual and intuitive, but don't let the ice cream theme or our adorable mascot SCOOPS fool you because this game has many layers of strategic depth and specialty rules to excite the most serious gamers!
5th Kickstarter Game Thanks to Backers Like You!
Thanks to Backers like YOU, this is my 5th Kickstarter campaign and all of these great games are available as gifts for everyone on your holiday list!
Our previous family, and party UNCORKED GAMES! have each been named a Kickstarter "Project We Love" and have gone on to be awarded Amazon's Choice! In fact, you can think of ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM! as the love child of our latest and most popular games: WHISKEY BUSINESS! (4.7 Stars on Amazon) & ICE CREAM EMPIRE (4.9 Stars on Amazon)! Our new release gets his risky nature and wild excitement from his whiskey-loving Pops and his aesthetic charm and delightful good looks from his Mama's ice cream theme!   
Here's what you get in this ice cream social game
ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM! comes with 7 ice cream dice, flavored cones in 4 colors, each player gets their own game board and coaster to keep track of your score!
Here is the link to the complete rules of ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM! as well as SCOOPS singing our catchy jingle: https://www.uncorkedgames.com/ice-cream-you-scream
Kickstarter launched our original party games from UNCORKED GAMES!
UNCORKED GAMES! are available on our website in the future, but this Kickstarter campaign is your opportunity to get these great games for deep discounts and they will be shipped over Labor Day so you can check your holiday list off early because there is a game for everyone!
Deep Discounts for your Holiday Shopping Today!
With this Kickstarter project, all 5 of our UNCORKED GAMES! are available for some seriously sweet savings! There are incredible early-bird specials and birthday deals for our loyalist backers where you can save more than 50% OFF! You'll find a game (or two) for everyone on your holiday list and best of all our first 4 games whip in September as soon as our campaign concludes! ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM is ready to manufacture as soon as we reach our funding goal and will ship in December so that you can give it as a gift and enjoy playing with the whole family for the holidays! Especially during these days of social isolation there is nothing more lovely than an ice cream social so get a game for a friend and you can connect and play over Zoom!
ICE CREAM EMPIRE Enjoys 4.9 Stars on Amazon!
ICE CREAM EMPIRE! 2018 Kickstarter "Project We Love!" "Amazon's Choice" 4.9 Stars! Ships in September, EMPIRE GAMES!
READ BETWEEN THE WINES! The Party Game of Wine, Wit & Wordplay!
READ BETWEEN THE WINES! 2014 Kickstarter "Project We Love!" "Amazon's Choice" with 4.3 Stars! Ships in September from FBA, UNCORKED GAMES!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Thanks to amazing Kickstarter Backers like you, I hope that this will be my 5th successful Kickstarter campaign! I have assembled an All-Star team and amazing designer and manufacturer so I have every confidence that I'll be able to deliver another outstanding game to all of our backers! Best of all, my first 4 games are already at Amazon where they've all been named "Amazon's Choice" and enjoy rave reviews! I'll ship the original games out as soon as our successful campaign closes and have addresses as early as Labor Day so that you can play from home if you're still quarantined and keep your kids entertained!

ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM! has already been designed and will be ready to print as soon as we fund this baby! The manufacturer is ready to go although we should note that with COVID-19 there may be factors or closures outside of our control that delay things like manufacturing time, shipping time, and Amazon delivery. The good news is that we've succeeded 4 times previously and have streamlined the process and will ship directly to Amazon from the manufacturer and then have our Amazon FBA account deliver your games right to your door with the original 4 games shipping around Labor Day and the reminder of the games getting at least to all of our US backers before the holidays as they make great gifts!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays, Beloved Backers!
updates.update_content:
Cheers to the Holidays and I hope that you are all staying safe and celebrating the season as best we can during these crazy times! I hope that ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM! brings your family some joy in playing together (even if it is at a safe distance over Zoom)! Mostly, I wanted to thank you for making my 5th Kickstarter game possible, I truly couldn't have done it without your support and I am so grateful for that!

You haven't heard from me for a bit because I wanted to sprint to the end of the year and get all of the UNCORKED GAMES! delivered to you as promised before Christmas! As far as I know every game has been delivered from the original UNCORKED GAMES! that you ordered that were shipped in the days following our successful Kickstarter campaign to the games around the globe that arrived in time to make it under the tree! It has been so encouraging to receive such wonderful notes from you and your kiddos and it warms my heart to know how much you're enjoy ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM! If you have a chance to write a review on my Amazon listing that will be a big help so that other families can discover my latest ice cream creation and play too!

updates.update_userinfo: Send Lars Thorn Your Address To Get Your Games And Order More For 50% Off! Check Your Email For My Survey Through BackerKit!
updates.update_content:
Check Your Email For My BackerKit Survey For Your Address!
What time is it? It's Game Time! I'm sending out your games starting tonight as soon as I get your shipping address! So just fill out the BackerKit survey that I sent out to you earlier today! It may be in your junk mail folder because it came from a BackerKit email address but it should show my name and the sooner you get your address back to me, the sooner you get to play your UNCORKED GAMES! I'll be fulfilling the 1st 4 UNCORKED GAMES from my Amazon FBA account and they should arrive in the coming week! As for ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM!, that should be completed in October and arrive stateside in November and get to you in December if not sooner! But my original games are shipping out tonight so go ahead and get some additional games as gifts for the holidays especially because they are all 50% OFF!

updates.update_content: By that I mean you did it! Thank you to the best backers in the business, all 273 of you made it possible for me to create my 5th game on Kickstarter and now we can all scream for ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM!
Thanks for Rolling the Dice on ICE CREAM YOU SCREAM!

comments.content: Is there a youtube video with detailed instructions?
Thanks Lars! We have both ice cream games and they are winners. Will definitely review for you!
Played last night with my kids and they love it! Jason
Any plans on adding this game to Board Game Geek? Tried to find it, so I could rate it & log games, but couldn't find it. If you have a BGG link for it, please share. Thanks :)
Haven't received ours yet :) is there a way to check my status?

I am compelled to give you some feedback. I received my game & am very excited to play this with my children for Christmas. However, while I was shopping online at Amazon, this same game popped up as "Sponsored Products related to items in your cart." It is available for only $29.99. With Amazon Prime, it's free shipping. As a backer, I paid $49 for the game & shipping. Essentially, I've overpaid for this game by $19. If you exclude the shipping, I've overpaid for the game by $10. In addition, your email after my pledge stated we'd be ones of the first to receive this game. I had no idea that it was only by a few days. While I'm sure I will enjoy the game, it leaves a sour taste in my mouth for the backing of your future games. If I can just wait a few days to get it on Amazon & save $19, then why would I be a backer? After all, $19 is worth another game I could buy. Or perhaps $19 could be justified if there were Kickstarter exclusives, but there weren't any. It is clear that you are fulfilling a need as this is your 5th successful Kickstarter. I just expected some more customer appreciation for your backers. Thanks for listening.

Thanks so very much! That is so very kind of you :) Good news...for the first time, I just received an email from Amazon stating that the order is on its way! I will be happy to write an Amazon review for this fun game. I haven't played the reverse side yet. I hope to do it by this weekend. Once I do, I'll happily write a thorough review! Thanks again!
Lars, we got your Ice Cream Empire game! Planning on playing it this weekend :) Thanks so much! And I'll get to some reviews too! Great customer service, especially during a pandemic!
Received today WA State!
Could you check to see if my game was shipped? I haven't received any emails. Thanks
Thank you!
Got mine. Looks good. I'll have to hide it from my daughter until she is a little older, she will want to steal the ice cream cones and possibly lose them... lol
Well, good!
we made it!
It's so close. It would be a shame if it doesn't fund. If there was some add-on that all the backers would want, we could hit funding

I'm most likely going to have to cancel my pledge due to financial reasons, after the campaign is over will there be any way to buy Ice Cream You Scream and your other games under the $125 level pledge?

Oh that is totally alright. Honestly the main issue is I just got put into a cast so I'm out of work for the next few months and I gotta watch my income. I'll be ok and I definitely want to play your games with my family and friends! When the timing is right!

campaign.story:
Introducing Loop
Loop is a minimal phone mount that sits discreetly on your bike's handlebars and is ready to use in seconds. It's totally different from anything else on the market and is perfect to help any cyclist get from A to B quickly and easily.   
 The Problem 
We love to explore on our bikes and using a phone makes it quicker and easier than ever. But constantly checking directions in traffic is hassle and can be dangerous.  
We've always loved the idea of a phone holder, but hated the way they look and work. We created Loop out of frustration with the existing solutions on the market - they're ugly, clunky to use or need accessories or phone cases just to work.   
The Solution
We created Loop from the ground up to be right for cycling. That means holding any size phone securely without ruining the look of your bike. We knew it needed to be quick and easy to use and that it shouldn't need any accessories to work.    We wanted to create something robust and beautifully engineered so started with an all-metal construction.  
We've made Loop work with all major phones (including an iPhone 11 Pro Max) and all handlebars sizes (22.2mm to 31.8mm - that's 7/8" to 1 1/4"). It will fit a lot of stems as well if they are close to round. Most importantly it's designed to look and feel like it's part of your bike.
It's completely different from anything on the market - we've protected the design with a worldwide patent pending and extra protection in China (中国专利审查中) with Jiaquan IP.
So what makes Loop different from everything else on the market?
1. Engineered to hold your phone securely
Loop has been engineered to be secure enough on the bumpiest roads. We've designed it for strength from the start - incorporating industrial springs which clamp your phone in place. 
Despite its strength - we wouldn't recommend it for off-road or extreme riding.
2. Quick and easy to use 
We wanted to make using Loop as quick and easy as jumping on your bike. So the interaction takes seconds - and requires absolutely no accessories.  
3. Looks and feels like part of your bike
Loop is inspired by your handlebars - low profile and discreet. It's designed to look and feel like it's part of your bike, whatever type of cyclist you are.      
4. Built to last
Loop made from CNC technology and it's all-metal construction is built to last.   
5. Made for every bike & every phone
Loop is designed to fit small to large phones, every type of bike, and all major sizes of handlebars.      
How we got here
 Sketching & Ideation
 CAD & Engineering 
Development & Prototyping
Testing 
Next Steps
Loop mount is fully designed, engineered and prototyped. We are looking for your support through kickstarter to help us pay for tooling, complete final testing and certification and produce the first batch of products.   
Rewards 
 Specs 
Colours
Loop comes in Black and Silver.  
Whats in the box
1 x Loop Mount
Small shim 
Medium shim 
Large shim
Allen Key
Phone Sizes
Loop opens up to 80mm / 3.15" - that is enough for large smart phone in a case. 
Handlebar Sizes 
Loop is designed to work on all major handlebar sizes (22.2mm to 31.8mm - that's 7/8" to 1 1/4"). It can also be mounted on your stem if it's tubular (or approximately circular).  
Collaborators
We're working with some great collaborators to help bring you this project...
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
More than $30,000,000 has been raised with Sprint's support
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Although this venture is new, our team has delivered dozens of Kickstarter projects worth millions of dollars. 

This project is relatively low risk - largely because there aren't any electronics. The design is also very advanced - we've fully design and engineered Loop and are looking for support to move onto to mass production. 

Having said that, no kickstarter is without risk and we have done what we can to mitigate these. 

1. Supply chain. We're working with trusted manufacturing partners - with whom we have relationships stretch back 7 years and with whom we have created 10+ hardware projects in the past. 

2. Certification & Testing. 
We have completed extensive testing of Loop. Having completed tooling we will need to complete certification testing to sell the product formally. This is something we have already planned extensively to help mitigate any delays to the project. The fact there are no electronics really help with this process. 
 
3. IP infringement
We have a patent pending on the design and in addition have taken out extra Ip protection in China. This includes engaging a highly respected Chinese IP firm who specialise in protecting IP on a project like this.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Thank you for making our project a reality! 
Getting our Kickstarter backers their Loop Mounts as soon as possible is our top priority. We are working really hard to finalise the final details. We are expecting our EVT prototype (Engineering Validation Test) this week from our manufacturer - which is one of the final steps before tooling begins. We'll keep you updated on progress via Kickstarter.
A few things need to happen before we can kick off production and fulfilment. Here's a quick rundown:

Dear Backers,
We've been overwhelmed with your support and enthusiasm for the project - so have decided to extend the campaign by a week - so there is now 6 additional days for anyone who wants to get their Loop Mounts.
This wont impact delivery time as we are continuing the development of the product in parallel of the campaign.

Dear Backers,
Thank you again for your support (we have now over 4000 backers!), we are very excited about putting our project into production - and soon onto your bikes...
We have now 6 days left on the campaign for anyone who wants to get a Loop Mount, so tell your friends!

updates.update_content:
A few weeks ago we shared all 56 of our finished base game cards. Today, we'd like to share 8 more that will be included in the Party Like it's 1999 Expansion. You would think choosing 8 more movie references from a single year wouldn't be much of a challenge, but 1999 was such a slammin' year for movies that it actually WAS quite a challenge!
So hard in fact that we called upon YOU to vote for your top 2 movies to reference. Those winners were OFFICE SPACE and GALAXY QUEST. A few 1999 classics! For the other 6 choices, we included your #3 choice (FIGHT CLUB), a few undeniably huge films, and a few selfish ones that we loved ;)

updates.update_userinfo: All the cards are finished, take a look!
updates.update_content: Hey friends, we hope everyone out there is having a safe and healthy holiday season so far. We have some great news. All 56 of our base game cards are complete and ready for the manufacturer. There are 56 cards in total with 25 unique deigns. You have no idea how hard it was for a couple of movie nerds like us to narrow down our references to just 25 films. But the good news is that we think these turned out great. Take a look.

campaign.story:
Thanks to You, We Fully Funded ICE CREAM EMPIRE on Kickstarter!
You can pre-order ICE CREAM EMPIRE on BackerKit.com
ICE CREAM EMPIRE will be available on Amazon.com in Fall of 2018!
ICE CREAM EMPIRE is a fun family tabletop board game for 2-4 players that teaches players how to build an Ice Cream Empire one scoop at a time! The ice cream theme is embraced by kids and they especially love the signature piece - the ice cream truck! The game itself excites the kid in all of us but it's strategic enough to appeal to the most serious gamer and no two games are alike. It's a perfect family game as it appeals to all ages although to fully enjoy the strategy of the game we recommend 9-99 years old and this game will be infinitely playable and enjoyable even for the most avid gamer!
ICE CREAM EMPIRE aerial view
In ICE CREAM EMPIRE is like a game within a game and the board reflects this with colorful spaces around the outside and a map of the United States on the inside. The signature piece is the ice cream truck of which there are 4 and they will be made in 4 different colors. There are 6 tons of 4 different flavors of ice cream that fit perfectly in the back of your truck that you buy and sell with stacks of $500, $100 and $50 bills. 
You roll the die to drive your truck around the board and the inventory cards tell you the market rates for each ice cream flavor. Each player builds ice cream shops with flags across the country and the first player to build 8 stores and has $3,000 cash wins. The beauty of ICE CREAM EMPIRE is that on a certain level everyone wins as they're building their ice empire. It's not a zero sum game where you whip out your opponents, it's just a race to see who can build their business into a success most quickly!
Ice Cream Empire Before a Game Night!
Get the game and remember it makes an amazing gift so get as many copies as you can! When you back ICE CREAM EMPIRE it makes us happy to know more people will enjoy this game and it provides the funds to be able to manufacture the minimum run of games including the expensive injection molds for the trucks.
You can get many multiples of ICE CREAM EMPIRE with more of a discount per game the more games you get. In the higher reward levels you can actually include yourself or a family member in the design of the game whether it is your face on the money, your kids face on the cover of the game or your brand name on the ice cream trucks!
Bottomline if there is a reward level that you would want just send us a message and we'll try to work with you for the perfect package for you. We'll also be using BackerKit where you can add on additional rewards. If you just want to support the project you are always welcome to make a contribution. With Kickstarter we have to reach our goal of $30,000 by May 31st for anyone's credit card to be charged and it is all or nothing so with your help we'll make this happen so we can create this game for you!
You can also have dinner with Colby and Lars in Los Angeles (for those who live or are traveling through LA). We'll cover dinner at one of Colby's amazing restaurants in Santa Monica followed by ice cream for dessert from Sweet Rose Creamery and we'll play the game with you and give you a copy. At the end of the day it is all about the game and we can't wait to get ICE CREAM EMPIRE out to the world!
Select a Sweet Rose Creamery Private Party in three Los Angeles Locations!
Introducing the Creators: Colby Goff and Lars Thorn
ICE CREAM EMPIRE was inspired by the Saturday morning kitchen tours at our ice cream company, Sweet Rose Creamery, located in Santa Monica, CA. Each Saturday morning we offer public tours of our ice cream kitchen where we walk kids and their families through the process of making cold desserts including ice cream, gelato, sorbet, sherbet, and frozen yogurt. Kids and families love these tours. They react with tremendous excitement to the ice cream, the ice cream delivery truck, the production process and the discussion about where we build ice cream stores. In addition, they asked thoughtful questions about ingredients and ice cream economics, all of which inspired the premise for Ice Cream Empire.
Ice Cream Empire was designed to demonstrate the basic tenets of the ice cream business. It’s a simplified metaphor of the business but teaches the principles of supply and demand, investing in ingredients in order to sell the final product with a positive margin, and ultimately driving business growth by building new distribution channels in the form of new retail stores. Put simply, players buy inventory, sell inventory at market rates which fluctuate based on flavor crazes, and then use the proceeds from sales to expand their empire by building new stores. Along the way players run into common business hurdles and competition and must navigate these obstacles. Throughout the game, players leverage their knowledge of simple applied math and US geography along with varying strategies to be the first to build an empire of 8 stores. The game is designed to be played in about an hour with 2 to 4 players and is designed such that all players will experience success in building an empire of ice cream stores, although the winner is simply the one to build their 8 stores first.
The game is not a zero sum game. Many classic board games have a single winner once all other players lose completely. Ice Cream Empire is designed such that all players build an empire and will experience success, the winner simply accomplishes success the most quickly.
Colby and Lars met through their mutual friend Mark Leibowitz who Colby had gone to Stanford with and Lars became great friends with on the Obama Campaign. The two game nerds immediately hit it off and Lars new this game was a winner and offered to help launch it and share it with the world. Together Colby and Lars have launched EMPIRE Games and already have a list of new games that they are excited to create and get out to you! 
Lars's Fiancee Julia Who Has Gotten So Good at the game that She's Now Called the Ice Cream Empress!
The Ice Cream Trucks Are The Most Popular Piece And Hold Your Ice Cream Inventory!
Please Enjoy Our ICE CREAM EMPIRE Jingle 
Written and Performed by Lars Thorn:
Ice Cream Empire! It’s the game for you! Ice Cream Empire! I’m telling you it’s true!
Just roll the die and move your truck, have an ice cream social with any luck! Build a store create a chain, making so much money that you make it rain! I scream, you scream, we all scream...for
Ice Cream Empire! It’s a family game! Ice Cream Empire! Please back us with your name. 
It’s easy to play one scoop at a time, it’ll be your favorite game cause I know it is mine! Build a biz with you and your kids, so please back us on Kickstarter if you want it to exist! It’s for little kids, big kids and all kids...back ICE CREAM EMPIRE! Today...and tell your friends!
PLAY

Follow us on Facebook for ICE CREAM EMPIRE updates! Facebook
Past Projects Now Available As Amazon's Choice:
Read Between The Wines! On Amazon as Amazon's Choice for Wine Game!
Brew Ha Ha! On Amazon as Amazon's Choice for Beer Game!
Brew Ha Ha! Second Kickstarter campaign in 2016
Uncorked! First Kickstarter campaign in 2014.
Thanks to Our All-Star Team Because it Takes a Village:

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Ice Cream Empire is my third Kickstarter Project that I have co-created having successfully funded, manufactured and distributed Uncorked! which is now Read Between The Wines! in 2014. As well as Brew Ha Ha! in 2016. Both games have become so popular that they have been selected as Amazon's Choice for wine game and beer game respectively. 

I have every expectation that Ice Cream Empire will also be a success with kids, families and gamers across the country and around the world. It is of course a lot of work to create a game but we're building off of our past success and going 3-for-3 on Kickstarter and have the all-star team in place to bring this game to you.

We have play tested Ice Cream Empire for two years to make the game as fun and infinitely playable as possible. Manufacturing overseas as well as the shipping always has unexpected delays so we are conservatively expecting to have the games in your hands by October and available on Amazon well before the holidays!

As with any bootstrapped projected it's all hands on deck including my Mom who will do a beautiful box cover illustration similar to the sample in the video and pictures but personalized for this project. We have a great manufacturer lined up and are excited to bring our third game to life so that you can enjoy playing it as much as we have with friends and family!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Thanks to your Kickstarter support, ICE CREAM EMPIRE exists and we just got the newly designed game from our manufacturer and your new game looks awesome! We are eager to get your games out to you as soon as we can so please send us your address ASAP through BackerKit!

updates.update_userinfo: ICE CREAM EMPIRE is being designed and up next on Kickstarter... WHISKEY BUSINESS!
updates.update_content: ICE CREAM EMPIRE UPDATE!

updates.update_userinfo: ICE CREAM, YOU SCREAM WE ALL SCREAM FOR ICE CREAM EMPIRE!
updates.update_content:
IT'S OFFICIAL, ICE CREAM EMPIRE IS FULLY FUNDED, THANKS TO YOU!
We did it! In fact, you did it! Specifically 221 of you made incredibly generous contributions to raise $30,522 and make our ice cream dreams come true! All there is left to say is, cheers to you with a cherry on top!

updates.update_userinfo: The Final Countdown: ICE CREAM EMPIRE Kickstarter campaign ends at midnight today!
updates.update_content:
19 hours and counting... and we are counting 199 incredible backers (YOU) who have gotten us so close to our Kickstarter goal to create ICE CREAM EMPIRE! Today is the final day of our Kickstarter campaign and it ends on Thursday, May 31st at 11:59pm here in Los Angeles! If you can think of anyone else who would enjoy our game or is a fan of ice cream or family time please have them back the game before the buzzer sounds!
We are down to the final $782 left to raise and thanks to you, we are within striking distance of reaching our goal! It's always exciting to see who puts us over the top and you can always edit your pledge to increase your reward if you're feeling inspired! Lars plans to do a Kickstarter/Facebook live on Thursday around noon PDT and see if we can cross the finish line together! The goal is to keep Colby from having a heart attack and thanks to you all, you have made this long and challenging journey so rewarding and we can't wait to manufacture ICE CREAM EMPIRE so that we can get your rewards out to you!

updates.update_userinfo: Thanks to your generosity we've reached $20,000+ on kickstarter and have 9 days to raise the final $9,504!
updates.update_content:
Thank you for your support of ICE CREAM EMPIRE! We certainly couldn't do it without you and our 135 backers and we hope that you can spread the word in the home stretch to reach our goal of $30,000 by the last day of May (here is the link to share: https://kck.st/2HJMJGD). 
Remember with Kickstarter this is an all-or-nothing proposition so if we don't get to our goal we won't charge any credit cards and won't fulfill the rewards. But we're working hard to ensure that we get over the finish line because we are so excited to manufacture ICE CREAM EMPIRE so that we can get it out to the world, starting with you!

updates.update_userinfo: CHEERS TO YOU! Thanks to you and 90 incredible backers we are 40% of our way to fund ICE CREAM EMPIRE!
updates.update_content:
Happy Friday and Mother's Day on Sunday!
As we come to the close of a busy work week, we wanted to thank you so much for your generosity and support in helping our ice cream dreams come true! As of moments ago we just reached our 90th backer and have raised the first $12,000 which is 40% of our $30,000 goal! We've been working hard to make it happen so let's celebrate this weekend! Be sure to celebrate your Mother and Lars would like to give a special shout out to Ulrike Thorn whose creativity has always been an inspiration and it has been such a joy to have her creating the cover of our game - ICE CREAM EMPIRE!
Come Play ICE CREAM EMPIRE Over Ice Cream!

updates.update_userinfo: Thanks to you we've reached $10,000 and are one third of the way to creating ICE CREAM EMPIRE!
updates.update_content:
Thank you so much for your support!
Colby and I are so grateful to you for your generous contribution to help bring our game ICE CREAM EMPIRE to life! Thanks to you, we have reached more than $10,000 from 60+ backers and we are well on our way to the $30,000 goal to manufacture the inaugural run of games and get it out to the world! This is an all-or-nothing scenario and we don't charge anyone or fulfill the rewards unless we get to our goal and we need your help to get the word out!

campaign.story:
-
 It seems as though our day to day life has been progressively consumed with never-ending checklists, mundane tasks of our 9-5 jobs and the mind-numbing scroll of our social media feeds. Although some tasks have become much easier with the advancement of technology, it seems we've lost the ability to hone into our own thoughts, ideas, and reflections of what we really want, think and believe in. 
We found that many people (including ourselves) wear our overstimulation as a badge of honor; The more we do, the "better". We want to steer away from that socially constructed mindset and wanted to create a tool to help remind us to slow things down, be more mindful, present and overall more aware in our day-to-day.
For centuries and throughout different cultures around the globe, the egg has symbolized life, wealth and promise. Our goal was to use natural materials that can work in harmony with the eggs simple yet captivating symbology and design.
Balancing at 17mm wide and 23.38mm tall, the Thinking Egg has been ergonomically designed to feel great in your hands while also being extremely portable.
The Thinking Egg comes in four different organic materials that hold specific properties people can identify most to. Choose the Thinking Egg/s you can relate to most based on their specific metaphysical qualities.
The One, The Duo, The Nest , The 1/2 Dozen or the or The Dozen... the choice is all yours. You'll be able to select which Thinking Egg/s you'd like to receive when we send out a quick survey at the end of the campaign.
  This isn't our first rodeo. We've helped create and ship five other crowdfunding campaigns that were delivered successfully on time. We'll be continuing that tradition come fulfillment time for your Thinking Egg.
At Orijin Design Company, we strive to slow things down and intentionally think about designs and systems that can be made better. In a world inundated with information and stimuli, we aim to harmoniously intertwine form and function, making designs and systems that provide for the space to be present and aware in our daily lives. We're really excited to share The Thinking Egg with the Kickstarter community and to create a community of our own composed of individuals that desire to slow things down, be more mindful, present and overall more aware in our day-to-day. 
This project is promoted by Green Inbox Partner Program which includes risk free Facebook ads and press coverage.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’re extremely passionate about the Thinking Egg and committed to doing everything in our power to solve any challenges that may arise along the way – that’s a promise!

We have to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet our promised deadlines. We have our manufacturing and operations all ready to go, and we've made sure to leave enough time so that your Thinking Egg/s arrive as planned. We are confident that our calculated plan will work effectively once we're funded, and that we'll be putting your Thinking Egg in your hands by October.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey Supporters,
We are honoured and grateful that our newest project - Thinking Egg 2.0 - has been approved by Kickstarter for its launch in February 2021 🎉

updates.update_userinfo: Introducing The Newest Element of Our New Collection
updates.update_content:
We hope everyone is doing well and off to a great week! 
A very sweet and short update for you all today that we're extremely excited to share. 
Yesterday, we informed all our Orijin Sponge supporters and now we're letting all of our Thinking Egg supporters know (just in case we missed you!).

updates.update_userinfo: The Thinking Egg II is Now Live + Special Bonus For Our Day One Supporters✨

updates.update_content:
Overview: Helpful tips during this odd time & something special for you and a loved one. 
Why an update? Right now, of all times?!
It's Simple...
We wouldn't be here as a company right now if it wasn't for you. And we don't just mean that in a feel-good way - it's completely factual. All of the products we've had the pleasure to design and share (and all the new ones in the works) spun out of our success on Kickstarter with the Thinking Egg.  🙏🏼

updates.update_userinfo: 🎉 It's Official: Thinking Egg 2.0 is coming in 2021!

campaign.story:
Stretch Goal Announcement
If you are just seeing this project for the first time...
We added a stretch goal of $6000.  If we reach that amount, new artwork will be created for a Dragon coin.  This was a result of a vote by the backers in the comment section.  A Valkyrie and a female Rogue were tied for second.
The Dragon coin will be an additional coin that backers can choose from.
In addition, some backers asked if a stand was available as an add on.  The below stand is available for $1 each.  Just add $1 to your pledge for each stand that you want.  The stand comes in two pieces and you insert them together like an X.  It is the best stand I have come across.
This is our third Dice Coins project.  Our first two were delivered ahead of schedule and had great reviews. 
However, we are doing something different on this one.  Instead of using printed artwork on the coins, the character artwork is being molded into the coin so it has amazing 3D dimensional depth.  In addition, we are only creating d20 coins for this project.
Dwarf. This is a 3D character that can be chosen for a d20 Dice Coin.
  Minotaur. This is a 3D character that can be chosen for a d20 Dice Coin.
  Female Elf. This is a character that can be chosen for a d20 Dice Coin. This artwork will be molded into a 3D image.
  Dice Coins are a different take on dice. They work just as well as regular gaming dice but allow amazing artwork to be displayed on each one. They can also be used as rotatable stat counters and game markers. 
Designed to military challenge coin standards. 
Coins are made from a solid zinc alloy metal. 
Each coin weighs almost 2 ounces. 
Coins are 2 inches (50.8 mm) in diameter. 
   A Dice Coin d20 template. This was created without any 3D characters. Each coin will feature a different character in the center part of the coin. See above characters.
  The common side of the coin has a knob molded into the metal. Players use one or two hands to spin the coin like a top. Once the coin is spinning at full speed (which just takes a second), the player puts their finger at the bottom of the coin and stops it. The result is the first completely visible number to the left of the player's finger.  The project video shows them in action.  Listed at the end of project page is more info on how they compare to regular dice.
Common side of a Dice Coin. The spinning knob is in the center of the coin. Coins are 2 inches in diameter. They are much larger and thicker than a US quarter.
    We are creating three separate characters as shown above.  Each character will be in the center of a d20 Dice Coin. 
Dwarf - plated in antique gold metal.
Minotaur - plated in antique copper metal.
Female Elf - plated in antique silver metal. 
You can select whatever character you want. You could get one of each, three Dwarves, etc. A survey will be sent out at the end of the project to make your selection. You do NOT need to choose now.
Here is an example from our previous project.  The method used on this coin involved printing on metal and covering the image with an epoxy coating.  With the 3D Dice Coins, an epoxy coating is not needed since the image is molded into the coin.
  Dice have been around forever and they work really well. However, Dice Coins do have some advantages over traditional dice.  
Appearance, Weight, and Uniqueness  
The appearance of regular dice are generally limited to color, material, and size choices. A limited amount of artwork can be put on them but this often makes it difficult to see the numbers or symbols. Dice Coins have a large area that allows elaborate artwork to be displayed. Players can choose coins that have artwork that fits the theme of their game or their personal style. When you pick them up, they have substantial weight since they are made of solid brass. 
Dice Coins just look and feel cool. They are unique and each design is truly a work of art.  
Accuracy  
Dice are rolled and land on a number. Imperfections in the design, manufacturing, or composition of dice can result in statistical inaccuracies. Multi face dice are harder to manufacture so they are more prone to this.
This is NOT a factor with Dice Coins. A player manually stops the coin from spinning. Any manufacturing imperfections that would manifest themselves if the coins were allowed to stop spinning and come to rest on their own, do not happen since the player stops the coin before this occurs.  
In addition, players can't manipulate the coins like some players do with dice. When a Dice Coin is spinning at full speed (which just takes a second), the numbers are totally blurred and you can't anticipate the results of the spin. 
We were unaware, but one of our backers, Matthew J. Neagley, is a research/writer for Gnome Stew The Gaming Blog. He did an independent analysis of the accuracy of the Dice Coins. The results were very good to exceptional. Click here for the article link.  
Stat Counters, Markers, or a Nice Paperweight 
Dice Coins can be used as rotatable stat counters by using the bottom number on the coin. You just rotate the coin until the desired number is at the bottom. We staggered the placement of sequential numbers to eliminate any confusion on what number was being displayed in case a coin is moved slightly. 
Dice Coins can also be used as game markers. You can even use them as a nice paperweight that is sure to be an attention grabber.
Spinning Surface and Amount of Space Needed 
Dice Coins spin on everything you would roll a dice on. Tables, play mats, notebooks, etc. Just like dice, you would not use them on carpet. And again--just like dice--they make more noise if spun on a hard surface like glass. A table cloth, piece of paper, etc. eliminates the noise and they spin just fine. They excel on gaming play mats. 
Dice can bounce into another player's area or off the table. A VERY bad spin with a Dice Coin can do the same. However, Dice Coins are easier to control than dice, require a little less space to use, and they stay in the same area where they are spun. 
Disadvantages 
Dice Coins are more expensive than plastic poly dice. However, Dice Coins are actually cheaper than most specialty dice made of metal. Dice Coins are easier to make. 
You generally only want to spin one Dice Coin at a time. This is why we are focusing on a d20.  However, you can roll several regular dice at once. This is an advantage that regular dice have over Dice Coins. However, you can rapidly spin a Dice Coin several times in a row and add the results. See the project video. 
Dice Coins are not aerodynamic tops. On harder surfaces they can wobble some as they spin. However, this does not affect their accuracy one single bit.

Risks and challenges
This our fifth Kickstarter project. All previous ones have been delivered early or on time. We have a lot of experience making coins with our challenge coin company. This is what we do and we have never missed a promised delivery date.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
In order to make Alebrijes the short film we have imagined, we need to animate for a long time and the costs of production are very high. The biggest risk we have is having to reduce the short film to something much more basic than it really is, not what we dream about. But we are prepared to do it with the means we have. The biggest challenge is to achieve an animated short film that transcends and has a certain relevance in the festivals of the world.

Some rewards depend on whether the short film is complete, such as the premiere in vimeo, the puppets and the soundtrack. Our projection is that it is ready for November 2018. Others, however, may be delivered in advance, since they do not depend on the completion of the short.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Así fuimos haciendo Alebrijes.
Hola todos! como lo prometido es deuda en este post queremos mostrar un poco el proceso de realización .

Ha pasado un tiempo muy largo desde que comenzó esta aventura; les pedimos disculpas porque no hemos sido buenos anfitriones actualizando las noticias sobre el proyecto. Como animadores es un reto apartar la cabeza del trabajo, hemos estado casi 4 años atrapados animando todos los días, como mucho entusiasmo por lo que hacemos y poniendo toda la energía en que el cortometraje tenga la mejor calidad estética y conceptual posible.
Acá estamos de nuevo y queremos dedicar tiempo a mostrarles muchas de las cosas que hemos hecho gracias a ustedes.  Como les decía son 4 años de trabajo en que no hemos parado un solo momento, hay toneladas de fotos y procesos que en este tiempo de cuarentena hemos organizado y la idea es poder compartir material exclusivo con ustedes.

campaign.story:
media coverage flying tent
flying tent rendering
Description
You can use the flying tent as floating tent between two trees, 
as well as a bivy tent on the ground. 
floating tent
bivy tent
By removing the upper section using the zipper on the side you can easily turn the flying tent into a traditional hammock. 
The optional use of the hammock as rain poncho protects you from bad weather conditions.
hammock and rain poncho
poncho
smart solution - adjustable in length
What's your color?
You can choose Your flying tent out of three colors - sunset, grasshopper and ocean view.
choose your color
Details
You know the moment when you struggle setting up your tent? Not with us.
The technically innovative, patent pending solution with its fibreglass poles is based on the simplistic function of throw tents and allows an uncomplicated setup within 7 seconds. Due to the ultralight materials and valuable workmanship the flying tent weighs only 1,2 kg/ 2.64 lbs.
To ensure a long lasting product we manufacture with high quality and weather resistant materials.
flying tent facts, features & benefits
hydrostatic head rating of 5000mm

It blows away any other hammock solution. No more mosquito bites, stay whereever, whenever you want. We keep the mosquitos away.
mosquito protection
The flying tent has a clever ventilation system. On the bottom cool fresh air gets in trough inlet and escapes at the crescent –shaped vent windows on head and foot end.
ventilation system
Smart Packaging
Our smart and small packaging size of 40 x 34 x 4 cm or 15.7 x 13.4 x 1.6 inches makes flying tent applicable in any situation. 
smart and small packaging
fixed on backpack
easy fixing for biking
minimal size for hiking
ideal for fishing - set up fast and go
reliable companion on Your next family camping day
one product - lots of possibilites
tent dimensions
Project Timeline
flying tent timeline
Stretch Goals
Stretch goals
Our philosophy 
We have moved ourselves away from nature. Our lifestyles don’t allow us to spend much time outdoors anymore. We, the flying tent team, think that it’s about time that we reconnect with our source. “I’m simply out”, to capture awake emotions and leave the daily grind behind for a few hours.
Mission
Whether in the Austrian countryside or mountains on our doorstep – the outdoors is our passion. Our mission is to share this passion: with smart and reliable outdoor gear, independent and free outdoors. 
Vision 
The flying tent is not a single product, but the start of a vision for fully enjoying nature and travelling. Our Vision: “Smart outdoor gear with freedom and lightness on top for all people, who are looking for the ‘simply out’“.
Two trees for one flying tent
Our hearts beat for nature and the environment. For that reason we want to plant two trees for each pre-ordered flying tent on a piece of land.
Team
the highly motivated team
Why we need your support
Until now we have developed a number of fully operative prototypes. Although we were able to finance the flying tent up to this point on our own, we now need your support to produce the first batch of flying tent.  
Please help us make flying tent happen and take the chance to keep Your feet off the ground on your next outdoor adventure.
How you can support
By supporting us by reward you help us to produce the the first batch of flying tent.
Additional ways to support and help flying tent succeed:
tell your friends and family about flying tent  
invite your friends to our facebook page and to this campaign
share the links to this campaign  
share the links to our facebook page  
post about flying tent on facebook, twitter, instagram or any other social media channel  
SPREAD THE WORD!

Follow us on
                                                                            Thanks to our supporter and especially to the incredible crew!
Video created by: Elias Jerusalem (2dream productions)
DoP: Ulrich Neuburg (frameworld.at) & Elias Jerusalem (2dream productions)
This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any product development, unforeseen challenges are possible. The good news is that we have produced fully functional prototypes. We also ensured the producibility of flying tent and the availability of the required components with our manufacturers. Our team of professional industrial designers, engineers, sales, and marketing experts have a pretty good idea of what lies ahead and we're well equipped to deal with whatever comes our way.

That said, there are common obstacles that sometimes come up, which include:
• Design changes or minor adjustments to improve the final product causing delay
• Manufacturing, component, and material shortages from outside suppliers
• Shipments that are lost or damaged
• Customs delays
• Fulfillment: Delivery delays due to weather, strikes, inaccurate address information, doorstep package theft, etc.

As always, we are dedicated to making sure you know what is happening every step of the way. We'll be updating all of our "Adventurers" regularly and letting you know exactly what's going on.

Any pledge you make brings us one step closer to the goal. Help us make the world's first flying tent happen by clicking the "Back This Project" button at the top of the page. Also help us spread the word through sharing this Kickstarter page and linking over to our Facebook page and flyingtent.com web page. This networking will help us to reach our funding goal.

After all, we're doing this together! 
We thank you for your faith in us!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
We made it. Over the last six months, we have successfully shipped the batch of 3500 flying tents all over the world. In addition, our new webshop offering worldwide shipping went online.
At this point we would like to thank you again for your support. Without this we would never have come so far. We are even more pleased that many of our backers have shared great photos with us.

updates.update_userinfo: How do you use your flying tent correctly
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers, 
 Thank you for the numerous submissions of your photos, feedback and questions. With regard to several questions we have summarized some important points for the correct use of your flying tent.
1. The procedure for the correct set up must be strictly followed as explained in the written manual and video manual (on our YouTube Channel).

updates.update_userinfo: Project about to cross the finish line!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers
We are glad to inform you that the delivery is almost completed now and soon all of our supporters have gotten their flying tent - YEAH.
For this reason, we would like to thank you again for your patience and trust. We know and you know we had a few start-up difficulties, which led to a long delay of the delivery. Nevertheless, we have not given up our dream. Thanks to you we have managed to develop the best product.

Dear Backers,
we proudly present you our new flying tent – video manual – step by step. Here you can see how you set up your flying tent in a few seconds, due to the easy handling. 
The video includes all steps for each application – flying tent, bivy tent, hammock, rain poncho. Furthermore we have focused on using the supplies as well as packing up the flying tent. Including to this video manual you also will receive a written manual with your flying tent parcel.

Dear Backers, 
the time has come. In a few days your flying tents will leave production and take the great journey to you.

updates.update_userinfo: What happened the last few weeks?
updates.update_content:
In recent weeks, the quality control of flying tent has been carried out by the professional testing company Hanse Control. The company inspected the workmanship of flying tent and carried out material and loading tests. The quality control went very well and up to a few further quality improvements concerning load limit, we get all our certifications.  
In the production the improvements getting realized now and we are looking forward to send the first flying tents soon.

Dear Backers ,
we would like to remind you, that some of you have not answered the survey yet regarding delivery address and color selection. 
We kindly ask you to answer the survey by 31.12.2016, as we have to pass the addresses to our logistics partner. Please also submit changes in shipping address until 31.12.2016.

Christmas is on its way, time to relax and enjoy days with family.
Also a great year is coming to an end and there is no time more appropriate to say THANK YOU for your strong support. We are looking forward to a New Year with great adventures and opportunities.  
We wish all our supporters and customers a joyful holiday season. May it be filled with peace and celebration for the new year.

updates.update_userinfo: ISPO BRANDNEW WINNER 2017 in Hardware Summer
updates.update_content:
flying tent is proud winner of ISPO BRANDNEW AWARD 2017 in the “Hardware Summer” category. We want to THANK YOU, our great supporters. Only with the help of your feedback, we have managed to turn flying tent into this unique product.
ISPO BRANDNEW is the most important newcomer contest for the sports industry and the world‘s largest platform for sports start-ups. Since 2000, an international jury has selected the most innovative new product ideas.

Dear Backers,
we had some great experiences with our production partner and finally we are ready to tell you more about our super-cozy underquilt.
